verses.name: 1 Kings 7:45
verses.text: And the pots, and the shovels, and the basons: and all these vessels, which Hiram made to king Solomon for the house of the Lord, were of bright brass.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:46
verses.text: In the plain of Jordan did the king cast them, in the clay ground between Succoth and Zarthan.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:47
verses.text: And Solomon left all the vessels unweighed, because they were exceeding many: neither was the weight of the brass found out.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:48
verses.text: And Solomon made all the vessels that pertained unto the house of the Lord: the altar of gold, and the table of gold, whereupon the shewbread was,
